description: Information about the specimen that was extracted from the donor organism.
title: specimen_from_organism

organ.description: The organ that the biomaterial came from. e.g. liver, spleen, bicep muscle. Blood and connective tissue are considered organs. The term "organ" is very broadly defined here.

organ_part.description: A term for a specific part of the organ that the biomaterial came from. The term "organ part" is very broadly defined here.

state_of_specimen.description: State of the specimen at the time of collection and how it was preserved after removal.

collection_time.description: When the biomaterial was collection, in date-time format, yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ.
